section.title: Queries Using the Web Console
section.p: Once you have created a full text index, you can search it using the Couchbase Server Web Console (http://your-Couchbase:8091). Go to Indexes > Full Text. Select your index from the dropdown and then enter your query using the query string syntax. [LINK]

section.title: Queries Using the REST API
Query Counts
section.p: You can get a count of entries in an index overall by using the REST API: http://localhost:9110/api/index/beer-idx/count
